Articles.Content:
RedSpace Industries is trying it\'s hand in space planes. We desperately need test pilots to fly our new design only known as \'Test01\' for now we hope to have much feedback and design improvements from all of our future test pilots. We hope to have more deathtraps planes for you in the future.

> ![hm7Pb.png](http://i.imgur.com/hm7Pb.png)

> ![vIA6P.png](http://i.imgur.com/vIA6P.png)

> ![vJbF3.png](http://i.imgur.com/vJbF3.png)

> ![NYUpn.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/NYUpn.jpg)

> ![et57z.png](http://i.imgur.com/et57z.png)

> ![oZ8oW.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/oZ8oW.jpg)
After a spike in Fatalities we have dipped into our budget to add parachutes. Now we are that much closer to making these things survivable more fun. Again we love your feedback and upgraded designs.
